measure.name: Successful Agent Uploads Ratio
measure.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'AGENT_UPLOAD_STARTED' AND SOURCE_NODE = '$NODE$'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'AGENT_UPLOAD_SUCCESS' AND SOURCE_NODE = '$NODE$'

measure.name: Successful Remote Method Invocation Ratio
measure.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'RMI_SENT' AND SOURCE_NODE = '$NODE$'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'RMI_SUCCESSFUL' AND SOURCE_NODE = '$NODE$'

measure.name: Number of Method Invocations
measure.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'RMI_SENT' AND SOURCE_NODE = '$NODE$'

measure.name: Number of Agent Uploads
measure.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'AGENT_UPLOAD_SUCCESS' AND SOURCE_NODE = '$NODE$'

measure.name: Number of added or changed Artifacts
measure.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'ARTIFACT_ADDED' AND SOURCE_NODE = '$NODE$'

measure.name: Number of Service Registrations
measure.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'AGENT_REGISTERED' AND REMARKS='ServiceAgent' AND SOURCE_NODE = '$NODE$'

measure.name: Number of User Registrations
measure.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'AGENT_REGISTERED' AND (REMARKS='USerAgent' OR REMARKS='Mediator') AND SOURCE_NODE = '$NODE$'

measure.name: Average Time Users Logged-In in Seconds
measure.query: SELECT AVG(timestampdiff (2, char(r.UNREGISTRATION_DATE - r.REGISTRATION_DATE))) FROM LAS2PEERMON.REGISTERED_AT r, LAS2PEERMON.AGENT a WHERE r.AGENT_ID = a.AGENT_ID AND (a.TYPE='MEDIATOR' OR a.TYPE='USER') AND r.RUNNING_AT = '$NODE$'

measure.name: Number of User Registrations over Time
measure.query: SELECT varchar_format((timestamp('1970-01-01-00.00.00') + (TIME_STAMP/1000) seconds + CURRENT TIMEZONE), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS Time, COUNT(EVENT) AS "Registrations" FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'AGENT_REGISTERED' AND (REMARKS='UserAgent' OR REMARKS='Mediator') AND SOURCE_NODE = '$NODE$' GROUP BY varchar_format((timestamp('1970-01-01-00.00.00') + (TIME_STAMP/1000) seconds + CURRENT TIMEZONE), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')

measure.name: Number of send LAS2peer Messages over Time
measure.query: SELECT varchar_format((timestamp('1970-01-01-00.00.00') + (TIME_STAMP/1000) seconds + CURRENT TIMEZONE), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS Time, COUNT(EVENT) AS "Send Messages" FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'MESSAGE_SENDING' AND SOURCE_NODE = '$NODE$' GROUP BY varchar_format((timestamp('1970-01-01-00.00.00') + (TIME_STAMP/1000) seconds + CURRENT TIMEZONE), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')

measure.name: Number of private Chatrooms over Time
measure.query: SELECT varchar_format((timestamp('1970-01-01-00.00.00') + (TIME_STAMP/1000) seconds + CURRENT TIMEZONE), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS Time, COUNT(*) AS "Private Chatrooms" FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_3' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$' GROUP BY varchar_format((timestamp('1970-01-01-00.00.00') + (TIME_STAMP/1000) seconds + CURRENT TIMEZONE), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')

measure.name: Number of public Chatrooms over Time
measure.query: SELECT varchar_format((timestamp('1970-01-01-00.00.00') + (TIME_STAMP/1000) seconds + CURRENT TIMEZONE), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS Time, COUNT(*) AS "Public Chatrooms" FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_4' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$' GROUP BY varchar_format((timestamp('1970-01-01-00.00.00') + (TIME_STAMP/1000) seconds + CURRENT TIMEZONE), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')

measure.name: Number of send Messages over Time
measure.query: SELECT varchar_format((timestamp('1970-01-01-00.00.00') + (TIME_STAMP/1000) seconds + CURRENT TIMEZONE), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS Time, COUNT(*) AS "Send Messages" FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE (EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_2' OR EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_1') AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$' GROUP BY varchar_format((timestamp('1970-01-01-00.00.00') + (TIME_STAMP/1000) seconds + CURRENT TIMEZONE), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')

measure.name: Number of Received Messages over Time
measure.query: SELECT varchar_format((timestamp('1970-01-01-00.00.00') + (TIME_STAMP/1000) seconds + CURRENT TIMEZONE), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS Time, COUNT(*) AS "Received Messages" FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_7' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$' GROUP BY varchar_format((timestamp('1970-01-01-00.00.00') + (TIME_STAMP/1000) seconds + CURRENT TIMEZONE), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')

measure.name: Average Number of Users per private Chatroom
measure.query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS Number FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_3' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$'

SELECT COUNT(privateJoins.PrivateJoins) AS UniqueJoins FROM (SELECT joins.uniqueJoins AS PrivateJoins FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE, ((SELECT COUNT(DESTINATION_AGENT) AS uniqueJoins, REMARKS FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_8' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$' GROUP BY DESTINATION_AGENT, REMARKS)) joins WHERE joins.REMARKS = LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE.REMARKS AND LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE.EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_3') privateJoins

measure.name: Average Number of Users per public Chatroom
measure.query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS Number FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_4' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$'

SELECT COUNT(publicJoins.PublicJoins) AS UniqueJoins FROM (SELECT joins.uniqueJoins AS PublicJoins FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE, ((SELECT COUNT(DESTINATION_AGENT) AS uniqueJoins, REMARKS FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_8' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$' GROUP BY DESTINATION_AGENT, REMARKS)) joins WHERE joins.REMARKS = LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE.REMARKS AND LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE.EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_4') publicJoins

measure.name: Average Number of Messages send per User
measure.query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS UserCount FROM (SELECT DESTINATION_AGENT AS AllUsers FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_8' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$' GROUP BY DESTINATION_AGENT) allUsers
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_1' OR EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_2' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$'

measure.name: Average Number of Messages received per User
measure.query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS UserCount FROM (SELECT DESTINATION_AGENT AS AllUsers FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_8' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$' GROUP BY DESTINATION_AGENT) allUsers
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_7' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$'

measure.name: Average Time to fetch Chatroom Information in Milliseconds
measure.query: SELECT AVG(timeToFetch.difference) AS AverageTime FROM (SELECT (m2.TIME_STAMP - m.TIME_STAMP) AS difference FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE m, LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE m2 WHERE m.EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_5' AND m2.EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_6' AND m.REMARKS=m2.REMARKS AND m.SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$' AND m2.SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$') timeToFetch

measure.name: Average Time to send Message in Milliseconds
measure.query: SELECT AVG(timeToSend.difference) AS AverageTime FROM (SELECT (m2.TIME_STAMP - m.TIME_STAMP) AS difference FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE m, LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE m2 WHERE (m.EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_1' OR m.EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_2') AND m2.EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_10' AND m.REMARKS=m2.REMARKS AND m.SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$') timeToSend

measure.name: Average Time spend in Chatroom in Seconds
measure.query: SELECT AVG(timeSpend.difference)/1000 AS AverageTime FROM (SELECT AVG(m2.TIME_STAMP - m.TIME_STAMP) AS difference FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE m, LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE m2 WHERE m.EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_8' AND m2.EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_9' AND m.REMARKS = m2.REMARKS AND m.ID < m2.ID AND m.SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$' AND m2.SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$' GROUP BY m.ID) AS timeSpend

measure.name: Total Number of Messages shared
measure.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE (EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_1' OR EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_2') AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$'

measure.name: Total Time spend in Chatroom in Minutes
measure.query: SELECT SUM(timeSpend.difference)/1000/60 AS TotalTime FROM (SELECT AVG(m2.TIME_STAMP - m.TIME_STAMP) AS difference FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE m, LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE m2 WHERE m.EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_8' AND m2.EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_9' AND m.REMARKS = m2.REMARKS AND m.ID < m2.ID AND m.SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$' AND m2.SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$' GROUP BY m.ID) AS timeSpend

measure.name: Average Number of created Chatrooms per User
measure.query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS UserCount FROM (SELECT DESTINATION_AGENT AS AllUsers FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_8' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$' GROUP BY DESTINATION_AGENT) allUsers
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE (EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_3' or EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_4') AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$'
